video.title: Git & GitHub: Cloning & Working Locally
video.description:
We're busy people who learn to code, then practice by building projects for nonprofits. Learn Full-stack JavaScript, build a portfolio, and get great references with our open source community.

Join our community at https://freecodecamp.com
Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/freecodecamp
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/freecodecamp
Follow Quincy on Quora: https://www.quora.com/Quincy-Larson

topLevelComment.author: Abdulhamid Alsalman
topLevelComment.text: This is the best Git & Github tutorial series on the web. This series is a masterpiece 💯.

topLevelComment.author: Kshitiz Gupta
topLevelComment.text: i am just amazed at the presentation and how happy is the person presenting

topLevelComment.author: displacednaija
topLevelComment.text: I feel like going back to Uni. Wow!

topLevelComment.author: Adeyemi Olusegun
topLevelComment.text: I love to talk about forking
